verbose_text: The resultant pH sensitive PEI coated NPs exhibited negligible cytotoxicity at pH 7.4 as a result of the surface exposed carboxylates on NPs, however, the surface charge on the NPs increased under acidic conditions due to both deblocking of the primary amine groups and protonation of amine groups remaining in the PEI, thereby triggering cytotoxicity.
evidence: NPs increased under acidic conditions due to both deblocking of the primary amine groups and protonation of amine groups remaining in the PEI
